title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the PGA Championship and NBA Playoffs from the weekend. Will we remember how Justin Thomas won his 2nd major or how Mito Pereira what would have been his first. Ernie Johnson Jr. joins the show to discuss how he goes up mediating Shaq and Charles Barkley 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
